content: measurements width 2 5 cm / 0 9 length 12 5 cm / 4 9 pattern information this pattern utilizes crochet stitches such as single_crochet single_crochet increases increase and decreases decrease if you re new to amigurumi don t worry the instructions are clear and perfect for beginners the pattern includes guidance on how to change colors in order to achieve the markings of a sardine it s an opportunity for you to experiment with color combinations that add a personalized touch to your amigurumi creation if you re someone who likes having instructions the pattern actually comes with photos that show you important steps like putting in the eyes and closing up the last hole this visual guide makes following the pattern easier enjoy pattern no 1260-241-1019
